problems.title: Check Palindrome Recursively
problems.description:
Write a recursive function to check if a given string is a palindrome. A string is a palindrome if it reads the same forwards and backwards.

Input Format:
A single string S.

Output Format:
Print 'True' if S is a palindrome, else 'False'.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
racecar

Sample Output
True

Sample Input
hello

Sample Output
False
hintsList: Think about the base case and the recursive step.
